description.value:
Once per day as a full-round action, you can summon a spirit rat, pigeon, or similar tiny creature to serve as your eyes on, above, and beneath the streetsâ€”this spirit serves as an @Compendium[pf1.spells.fmuea6pmgrylbux7]{Arcane Eye}.

At 10th level, you can summon multiple such spirits; this ability functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.68quvqg93a3da02z]{Prying Eyes}.

At 15th level, this ability functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.21ksduh3fm41vmjk]{Prying Eyes, Greater}.
